mapper.select: SELECT C.COMPANY_ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, M.MEMBER_NAME, MG.MEMBER_GRADE , C.COMPANY_ADDR, C.COMPANY_TEL, M.MEMBER_NAME,MG.MEMBER_GRADE, C.COMPANY_CEO , S.SUBSCRIBE_START_DATE, S.SUBSCRIBE_END_DATE , (S.SUBSCRIBE_END_DATE-S.SUBSCRIBE_START_DATE) AS SUB_DAY FROM COMPANY C JOIN ASSOCIATION A ON C.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_ID JOIN MEMBER M ON A.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN MEMBER_GRADE MG ON M.MEMBER_GRADE_ID = MG.MEMBER_GRADE_ID JOIN SUBSCRIBE S ON M.MEMBER_ID = S.MEMBER_ID WHERE MG.MEMBER_GRADE_ID = 2 AND S.SUBSCRIBE_USE = 'Y'

SELECT M.MEMBER_ID,MEMBER_GRADE,MEMBER_NAME,C.COMPANY_NAME,C.COMPANY_TEL,C.COMPANY_ADDR FROM MEMBER M JOIN MEMBER_GRADE MG ON M.MEMBER_GRADE_ID = MG.MEMBER_GRADE_ID JOIN ASSOCIATION A2 on M.MEMBER_ID = A2.MEMBER_ID JOIN COMPANY C ON A2.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(COMPANY_ID),0) FROM COMPANY
INSERT INTO COMPANY(COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_ADDR, COMPANY_TEL,COMPANY_CEO) VALUES (#{companyName},#{companyAddr},#{companyTel},#{companyCeo})
mapper.select:
SELECT C.*, M.MEMBER_NAME, RS.REQUEST_STATUS, A.memberCount FROM COMPANY C LEFT JOIN WAITING_LIST WL ON C.COMPANY_ID = WL.COMPANY_ID AND WL.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} LEFT JOIN REQUEST_STATUS RS ON WL.REQUEST_STATUS_ID = RS.REQUEST_STATUS_ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON WL.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT C.COMPANY_ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, COUNT(WL.MEMBER_ID) AS memberCount FROM COMPANY C LEFT JOIN WAITING_LIST WL ON C.COMPANY_ID = WL.COMPANY_ID AND WL.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} GROUP BY C.COMPANY_ID,C.COMPANY_NAME ) A ON A.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID
WHERE A.COMPANY_NAME like '%'|| #{search} ||'%'

SELECT C.COMPANY_NAME, M.MEMBER_NAME,RS.REQUEST_STATUS,M.MEMBER_ID FROM WAITING_LIST WL JOIN MEMBER M on WL.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN REQUEST_STATUS RS on WL.REQUEST_STATUS_ID = RS.REQUEST_STATUS_ID JOIN COMPANY C ON WL.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID WHERE C.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}
